snippet: Kathleen McCartney, the dean of the Harvard Graduate School of Education, will succeed Carol T. Christ as Smith’s next president.
abstract: Kathleen McCartney, the dean of the Harvard Graduate School of Education, will succeed Carol T. Christ as Smith’s next president.
lead_paragraph: Smith College has selected Kathleen McCartney, the dean of the Harvard Graduate School of Education, to succeed Carol T. Christ as the college’s next president, our colleague Tamar Lewin reports.

headline.main: Harvard Dean Is Chosen to Lead Smith College
